text: @ndtv Shameless @rsprasad !@RahulGandhi was the only one who was asking @narendramodi the plan to curb covid19. Announcement of pandemic @BJP4India delayed to topple Madhya Pradesh govt but they did not wait to send the migrants back to their own villages and announce lockdown.
